author: norman
msg: FETCH *.MIME fields MUST NOT write a empty line terminated with a CRLF if no MIME Header was found and FETCH *.HEADER MUST NOT write a empty line terminated with a CRLF if no body was found. IMAP-297 and IMAP-298

author: norman
msg: Make sure the idle heartbeat get terminated once the idle state was left. See IMAP-299

author: jcian
msg: Adding an IntelliJ code style shared configuration file for Rave.  This actually doesnt have any changes from the IntelliJ default right now but I'm guessing in the future we'll need to make at least some changes so this should let us share those changes.
On my workstation this file lives at:

If you copy it there and restart IntelliJ it should pick it up and make it an available as an option to use for the project.  Anytime we change it we'll have to copy it from there and commit it back to source control.  IntelliJ doesnt seem to have the option to store it/read it from an alternate location.  References here:

author: kkolinko
msg: Amend the page. Be more reserved when directing users to bugzilla.
